name: Tottoko Hamtaro Nazo Nazo Q Kumonoue no? Jou
description: Tottoko Hamtaro Nazo Nazo Q Kumonoue no? Jou is a game in Japanese starring the character Hamtaro. It revolves around questions and riddles as the player answers sets of questions. Three different answers are provided and the player must select the correct answer. Players are able to use hints, but gain more points if less or no hints are used. The player has the ability to collect different types of furniture for Hamtaro's room. The game also supports a multiplayer mode where players try to answer questions faster than the other player. Multiplayer is supported with Multi-Card play or Single-Card through Download Play.
